Doc: The type of automatic adjustment that a Letter of Credit can exhibit.

Source.Contents:
/#
 The type of automatic adjustment that a Letter of Credit can exhibit.
 #/
enum FpML5.confirmation.AccrualReferenceAmountTypeEnum {
    # The accrual is calculated using the facility commitment amount as the reference amount.
    Commitment 
    # The accrual is calculated using the facility total funded amount as the reference amount.
    Funded 
    # The accrual is calculated using another type of (calculated) reference amount.
    Other 
    # The accrual is calculated using the total facility unfunded amount as the reference amount. The unfunded amount refers to the amount of commitment which has been utilized with unfunded products (e.g. L/Cs).
    Unfunded 
    # The accrual is calculated using the facility total unutilized amount as the reference amount. The unutilized amount refers to the amount of commitment which has not yet been borrowed.
    Unutilized 
    # The accrual is calculated using the facility total utilized amount as the reference amount. The utilized amount includes both funded and unfunded borrowings.
    Utilized 

}

Commitment.Doc: The accrual is calculated using the facility commitment amount as the reference amount.
Commitment.Name: Commitment

Funded.Doc: The accrual is calculated using the facility total funded amount as the reference amount.
Funded.Name: Funded

Other.Doc: The accrual is calculated using another type of (calculated) reference amount.
Other.Name: Other

Unfunded.Doc: The accrual is calculated using the total facility unfunded amount as the reference amount. The unfunded amount refers to the amount of commitment which has been utilized with unfunded products (e.g. L/Cs).
Unfunded.Name: Unfunded

Unutilized.Doc: The accrual is calculated using the facility total unutilized amount as the reference amount. The unutilized amount refers to the amount of commitment which has not yet been borrowed.
Unutilized.Name: Unutilized

Utilized.Doc: The accrual is calculated using the facility total utilized amount as the reference amount. The utilized amount includes both funded and unfunded borrowings.
Utilized.Name: Utilized
